title: Chemically specific sampling bias: the ratio of PM2.5 to surface AOD on average and peak days in the U.S.
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, 4,547-556
DOI: 10.1039/D3EA00163F, Paper

Simon Rosanka, Madison M. Flesch, Yin Ting T. Chiu, Annmarie G. Carlton
Accurate quantitative description of the atmospheric fine particulate matter (PM2.5) burden requires an understanding of aerosol amounts and physicochemical properties that transcends measurement platforms.
